hero.subtitle: Access a curated network of vetted nano-influencers (1-50k). The first performance-based B2B marketplace.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps from match to measurable growth.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Find verified creators who understand your tech stack.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Authentic content shared across social platforms.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Monitor performance and grow what works.

caseStudy.title: The naano Framework:
caseStudy.subtitle: Consistency meets Virality.
caseStudy.description: We don't just match you with creators.
caseStudy.descriptionBold: We train them to write posts that convert specifically for brands.
caseStudy.viralHooksDesc: Our creators know how to stop the scroll with proven frameworks.
caseStudy.authenticStorytellingDesc: Real experiences, real results. No generic ad copy.
caseStudy.massiveReachDesc: 100K+ impressions from accounts with just 2K followers.

creatorShowcase.title: Find your perfect match
creatorShowcase.subtitle: Browse through hundreds of vetted B2B creators ready to showcase your product.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pay per qualified click. Volume discounts included.
pricing.creatorSubtitle: We take a small commission on your earnings — only when you get paid.
pricing.naanoProDesc: Post about Naano on LinkedIn and unlock 6 months of Pro — earn €1.10 per qualified click instead of €0.90. No payment required.

brands.a1: Every creator is manually verified. We review their GitHub contributions, LinkedIn profile, audience engagement metrics, and content quality. Only the top 1% make it through.
brands.a2: Brands get full commercial rights to use the content for ads, landing pages, and organic social media. Creators retain portfolio rights.
brands.a3: Brands pay based on performance, not vanity metrics. Pricing depends on the campaign scope and outcomes, so you only pay for real value delivered.

creators.q1: Is it really free for creators?
creators.a1: Yes, absolutely. We charge a service fee to the brands, not the talent. You keep 100% of your negotiated rate.
creators.a2: Naano Pro lets you earn €1.10 per qualified click instead of €0.90. Post about Naano on LinkedIn (with your unique link), submit the post URL in your dashboard, and Pro unlocks automatically for 6 months. No payment required.
creators.a3: Sign up as a creator, complete your profile, and start applying to campaigns that match your expertise. Once approved, you'll receive tracked links and can start creating content.
creators.a4: Payment is released instantly once the brand validates your deliverable. Funds are secured upfront when a campaign is approved, so you're guaranteed payment for completed work.

footer.tagline: The first B2B marketplace connecting SaaS brands with vetted nano-influencers.
